snippet: Blue Jackets defenseman Jack Johnson, a 10-time member of the national hockey team, was among the veterans left out when the Olympic roster was announced after the Winter Classic.
abstract: Roster of 25 players for United States Olympic men's hockey team is unveiled and many veterans are left out; women’s team is also introduced and features 11 holdovers from the squad that won a silver medal in Vancouver .
lead_paragraph: Blue Jackets defenseman Jack Johnson, a 10-time member of the national hockey team, was among the veterans left out when the Olympic roster was announced after the Winter Classic.

headline.main: With Talent Abundant, U.S. Makes Tough Cuts
headline.print_headline: With Talent Abundant, U.S. Makes Tough Cuts
